headline: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII): Evaluating Valuation After New Defense Tech, Submarine Partnership and 3D Printing Moves
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) has been busy on several fronts, from rolling out its GRIMM spectrum dominance system to expanding a submarine partnership with Babcock and investing in advanced metal 3D printing at Newport News. See our latest analysis for Huntington Ingalls Industries. Those moves seem to be resonating with investors, with Huntington Ingalls’ share price up a hefty year to date and supported by a strong 90 day share price return, while multi year total shareholder...
